content:
# I successfully gathered 10 units of stone! 
# Now my inventory contains:
# - 5 units of coal
# - 10 units of stone
# - 5 units of iron ore

# Step 26: With the stone now collected, I can proceed to craft the Stone Furnace, which requires stone. 
# I will ensure I have enough resources to craft the furnace before proceeding.

# Attempting to craft the Stone Furnace now that I have the required materials.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Trying to craft one Stone Furnace.
